description: '''Breakbeat''' is a broad type of [[electronic music]] that uses [[drum breaks]], often sampled from early recordings of [[funk]], [[jazz]], and [[rhythm and blues|R&B]]. Breakbeats have been used in styles such as [[Florida breaks]], [[hip-hop]], [[Jungle music|jungle]], [[drum and bass]], [[big beat]], [[breakbeat hardcore]], and [[UK garage]] styles (including [[2-step garage|2-step]], [[breakstep]] and [[dubstep]]).
